analyzed: nor bu'i bum pa rin po ches bkang ba thugs khar bsnams pa/_g.yon yid

analyzed: zhabs g.yas skum g.yon brkyang ba'i phyed dkyil gyis pad+ma dang rin po che'i gdan

analyzed: bdun no/_/gnyis pa la om na ma shu kra mu khri ma ha pi sha tshi ni ye swa ha/_ces

analyzed: lan bdun no/_/gsum pa la/_om a na le kun d+ha li/_gyi na sin d+ha/_pi

original: sha tshi na ye swa ha/_ces pa'i sngags 'di gsum/_chang bu re re la lan bdun
analyzed: sha tshi na ye swa ha/_ces pa'i sngags 'di gsum/_chang bu re re la lan bdun

analyzed: grub kyis mdzad nas/_de'i 'grel pa bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa/_lotsh+tshha

original: ba rin chen grags pas bsgyur nas rim par rgyud pa'o/_/'di la the tshhom bya mi
analyzed: ba rin chen grags pas bsgyur nas rim par rgyud pa'o/_/'di la the tshhom bya mi
translated: There is no need to have any doubt about this.

original: dgos so/_/ 'di'i sgrub rtags ni bud med dang skye bo mang pos bsnyen bkur byed pa🔽dang /_lo tog rtshas ma rnga ba dang /_'bru'i char 'bab pa dang /_rin
analyzed: dgos so/_/ 'di'i sgrub rtags ni bud med dang skye bo mang pos bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_lo tog rtshas ma rnga ba dang /_'bru'i char 'bab pa dang /_rin
translated: The signs of accomplishment are that many men and women will serve you,🔽that the harvest will be bountiful, that a rain of grain will fall, that you will find a treasure of jewels, and so forth.

analyzed: po che'i gter rnyed pa dang /_'di rnams dngos sam rmi lam du 'byung gsung /

analyzed: 'di'i dam tshhig du/_bud med la mi smod/_bud med la brnyas par mi bya/

analyzed: mo mtshhan la ched du mi lta'o#/_/dus rgyun du yi dam du bya ba ni/_tad ya tha/
translated: and not to look at the female organ for its own sake.🔽The regular practice is to recite the following mantra four hundred times in the evening:
